You can create an UltimateOscillator indicator that does not automatically update. This lets you update the indicator with any data you choose. The following reference table describes the UltimateOscillator constructor.

UltimateOscillator()1/1

            UltimateOscillator QuantConnect.Indicators.UltimateOscillator (
    *string                       name,
    Int32                        period1,
    Int32                        period2,
    Int32                        period3,
   )

Creates a new UltimateOscillator indicator.

Parameters
*string name (Optional) The custom name of the indicator whose ULTOSC we want.
Int32 period1 The first period over which to compute the ULTOSC.
Int32 period2 The second period over which to compute the ULTOSC.
Int32 period3 The third period over which to compute the ULTOSC.

Return

UltimateOscillator - The UltimateOscillator indicator for the requested name over the specified period

Definition at file Indicators/UltimateOscillator.cs.


You can update the indicator automatically or manually.

Automatic Update

Create a consolidator and then call the RegisterIndicator method to update the indicator with the consolidated bars.

private UltimateOscillator _ultosc;

// In Initialize()
_ultosc = new UltimateOscillator(period1, period2, period3);
_ultosc.Updated += IndicatorUpdateMethod;

var thirtyMinuteConsolidator = new TradeBarConsolidator(TimeSpan.FromMinutes(30));
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
SubscriptionManager.AddConsolidator(symbol, thirtyMinuteConsolidator);

RegisterIndicator(symbol, _ultosc, thirtyMinuteConsolidator);

// In IndicatorUpdateMethod()
if (_ultosc.IsReady)
{
    var indicatorValue = _ultosc.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
self.ultosc = UltimateOscillator(period1, period2, period3)
self.ultosc.Updated += self.IndicatorUpdateMethod

thirty_minute_consolidator = TradeBarConsolidator(timedelta(minutes=30))
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.SubscriptionManager.AddConsolidator(symbol, thirty_minute_consolidator)

self.RegisterIndicator(symbol, self.ultosc, thirty_minute_consolidator)

# In IndicatorUpdateMethod()
if self.ultosc.IsReady:
    indicator_value = self.ultosc.Current.Value

Manual Update

Updating your indicator manually enables you to control when the indicator is updated and what data you use to update it. To manually update the indicator, call the Update method that with a TradeBar, QuoteBar, or an IndicatorDataPoint. The indicator will only be ready after you prime it with enough data.

private UltimateOscillator _ultosc;
private Symbol _symbol;

// In Initialize()
_ultosc = new UltimateOscillator(period1, period2, period3);
_symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;

// In OnData()
if (data.QuoteBars.ContainsKey(_symbol))
{
    _ultosc.Update(data.QuoteBars[_symbol]);
}
if (_ultosc.IsReady)
{
    var indicatorValue = _ultosc.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
self.ultosc = UltimateOscillator(period1, period2, period3)
self.symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol

# In OnData()
if data.QuoteBars.ContainsKey(self.symbol):
    self.ultosc.Update(data.QuoteBars[self.symbol])
if self.ultosc.IsReady:
    indicator_value = self.ultosc.Current.Value
